channel.title: Symantec not going away
channel.description:
Ok, at the moment when ever i try to do anything on my computer with files "Symantec" tries to install itself.
The reason I think this occurs is because I tried to uninstall it and it did not work so I just ended up deleted it from the "program files" folder...
the program that runs when it starts to install itself is called "msiexec.exe" I don't think that has anything to do with it because I believe that that is just the program that runs when anything is installed.
I am just wondering if anyone else has had this problem or if somebody can think of a solution. ..... this "Symantec" thing is really bothering grr.gif me and I would kill to have someone to assist me is fixing the problem!
Thanks a bunch, for reading my post and thank you to whoever attempts to solve the problem!

item.title: Symantec not going away
item.dc:creator: @bumr055 bumr055
item.description:
@bumr055 wrote:

Thabest:

looks like you’ve got yourself wrapped in an iamaminer1 situation, you deleted a very important file.

that sucks… any fix?

edit: fixed… took a bit of work and a cupple programmers… symantec makes good viruses… dont uninstall there software, they might brake your legs.

Read full topic
